intro.name: Muhammad Hasan Fadhlillah
intro.works_at: Life to Inspire | Data Enthusiast | Undergraduate Student of Informatics Engineering Faculty of Computer Science at University of Brawijaya

about.about_description: Muhammad Hasan Fadhlillah is usually called Hasan. He is a problem solver interested in social issues, discussion, technology development, and community development. He has good analytical, management, and graphic design skills. In addition, he has capacities and qualities in leadership, collaboration, and team organization. Driven by his life principles, he is passionate about learning new things to improve his abilities so that he can contribute to positively impacting those around him.

organizations.description: Basic Computing Community (BCC) is a community of students from the faculty of computer science at Brawijaya University who are interested in developing, exploring, and collaborating so that they can excel and produce useful and impactful digital products by doing workshops, participating in competitions, create and contribute to open sources, and introducing a real work environment.
